name: Send an email notification for every new article in RSS feed
description: Stay updated and streamline your communication with this template that automatically sends an email notification every time a new article is published in your chosen RSS feed. By integrating RSS and Google Email, you can ensure that you never miss important updates, keeping your audience informed and engaged. Simply set up your RSS feed URL, and let the automation handle the rest, delivering timely emails directly to your inbox or your subscribers.
